flawed_nl_solution:
Harry ran 10 x 1/2 = <<10*1/2=20>>20 meters per hour faster on Tuesday to Wednesday.
So he ran 10 + 20 = <<10+20=30>>30 meters per hour from Tuesday to Thursday.
Then on Friday, he ran 30 x 3/5 = <<30*3/5=18>>18 meters per hour more.
Therefore, he ran 30 + 18 = <<30+18=48>>48 meters per hour on Friday.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 20. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
